name: Postgres LISTEN/NOTIFY 最小
description: pg クライアントで LISTEN/NOTIFY を受信。

files.template:
const { Client } = require('pg');
(async () => { const c = new Client({ connectionString: 'postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/postgres' }); await c.connect(); await c.query('LISTEN events'); c.on('notification', (msg) => console.log('got', msg.payload)); console.log('listening events'); })();
